relevant_findings.HEENT: Normocephalic, atraumatic, PERRLA, extraocular movements intact, mucosa pink, no lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs or gallops
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or crackles
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-tender, non-distended; bowel sounds present x4 quadrants
relevant_findings.extremities: No clubbing, cyanosis, or edema; +2 pulses

relevant_findings.ultrasound_findings: The appendix is noncompressible and dilated, measuring up to 1.1 x 1.1 cm (transverse), with an appendicolith measuring 6 mm.
relevant_findings.periappendiceal_fluid: No evidence of periappendiceal fluid collection.
